event.title: Register for the FYA "training for trainers"
event.body: In the context of the South Tyrol Free Software Conference (SFScon), a FreeYourAndroid "training for trainers" workshop will take place at the TIS Innovation Park in Bolzano. Attendees of this workshop are supposed to give workshops themselves. If you like to attend, please register and write an email to Erik Albers
